creator: ravikiran@eiqnetworks.com
text:
Created attachment 32754
Attached the download page

There is no provision to download the apache httpd server 2.4.x versions from the apache download portal.

Comment on attachment 32754
Attached the download page

The page contains the info

"Downloading Apache for Windows

The Apache HTTP Server Project itself does not provide binary releases of software, only source code. Individual committers may provide binary packages as a convenience, but it is not a release deliverable.

If you cannot compile the Apache HTTP Server yourself, you can obtain a binary package from numerous binary distributions available on the Internet.

Popular options for deploying Apache httpd, and, optionally, PHP and MySQL, on Microsoft Windows, include:"

and then a list of links to 3rd-party binary downloads for Windows.

So yes, currently we do not provide Windows binaries.
creator: rainer.jung@kippdata.de
rainer.jung@kippdata.de
text:
If you have further questions, please use the user mailing list:
